definition: fart/flatulence/nonsense/(usu. in the negative) what/(not) a damn thing
incoherent (writing or speech)/nonsensical/a load of crap

sentences.english: So the whole yes thing is all bullshit?-No.
sentences.chinese: 所以這個‘好’和‘不’的理論都是狗屁？

sentences.english: All the shit that they could find.
sentences.chinese: 他們只會發現一堆狗屁倒竈的事情。

sentences.english: Life is always full of shit.
sentences.chinese: 生活總是充滿了狗屁倒竈的事情。

sentences.english: Because believe you me , all the rest of it is just coffeehousebullshit.
sentences.chinese: 因爲除此之外，其他的都是在咖啡店鬼扯的狗屁。

sentences.english: Your answer sucked, but I’ll keep my end of the bargain.
sentences.chinese: 你的答案是狗屁，但我還是會信守諾言。

sentences.english: It's up to you. Shit, my lottery lost again.
sentences.chinese: 你決定，狗屁，我的彩票又沒中。

sentences.english: Are you motherfuckers ready for the new shit?
sentences.chinese: 你們這些狗孃養的準備好接受新的狗屁了嗎？

sentences.english: “He knew that this was a holy-shit piece of film,” Amos told me.
sentences.chinese: 他知道這將是一部狗屁重磅的紀錄片。

sentences.english: Good, 'cause the Ten Commandments don't mean a box of piss in here.
sentences.chinese: 很好，因爲十戒在這裏狗屁不值。

sentences.english: I teach photography very differently from the old farts .
sentences.chinese: 傳統的攝影教育，我認爲全是放狗屁。
